ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got nothing to say to you. Best move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我对你没什么好说的。最好继续走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regulator Representative [0D01C42B] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult06dc\tttq_greeting_0001c430_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Always good to see a new face in the fight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在战斗中看见新面孔是件开心的事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regulator Representative [0D01C42B] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult06dc\tttq_greeting_0001c42f_1.wav
NPC : Regulator Representative [0D01C42B] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult06dc\tttq_greeting_0001c431_1.wav
NPC : Regulator Representative [0D01C42B] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult06dc\tttq_greeting_0001c433_1.wav
NPC : Regulator Representative [0D01C42B] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult06dc\tttq_greeting_0001c434_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got nothing to say to you, punk. Scram!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和你没什么好说的，混蛋。滚开！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Littlehorn & Associates Representative [0D01C435] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult04\tttq_greeting_0001c437_1.wav

NPC : Littlehorn & Associates Representative [0D01C435] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult04\tttq_greeting_0001c438_1.wav

NPC : Littlehorn & Associates Representative [0D01C435] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult04\tttq_greeting_0001c439_1.wav

NPC : Littlehorn & Associates Representative [0D01C435] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult04\tttq_greeting_0001c43a_1.wav

NPC : Littlehorn & Associates Representative [0D01C435] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult04\tttq_greeting_0001c43b_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In Atom's name, you'll pay for your transgressions!
ESP.TRADUIT: 以原子的名义，你会为你的罪行付出代价的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's time for us to part ways.
Are you certain that this is what you wish?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定这就是你想要的？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I may have misheard that order.
I think we should travel together.
I should definitely say so! Time to roll out!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我应该直接这么说！该出发了！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Time to head back into the fight, RL-3.
If you think you can reprogram him, then I'm happy to sell him to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你认为你可以对他重新编程，那么我很乐意把他卖给你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can override that part of his programming.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可以覆盖他编程的那部分。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I see you've got some of our Power Armor there. I'll just take that off your hands.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看到你那里有一些我们的动力装甲。我就不客气地拿走了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure you just found it in the Wastes and you're returning it to us, right? Because you'd have to be a real moron to try to turn it in for pay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我相信你是在废土找到的并且你会还给我们，对吧?因为如果你想把它上交拿钱，那你就太蠢了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now, let's see what else you've got.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在，让我们看看你还有什么。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got some technology to turn in.
I've got some technology to turn in.
I'm serious. We need to split up for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是认真的。我们现在需要分开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are dismissed for now, Sergeant.
I hope to see you again.

ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，孩子，你说什么都行。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah. We need to split up for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，我们现在需要分开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. Although you remain my employer until my contract changes hands. I will wait for you should you need me again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，虽然我被解雇了，但只要我的契约没有被转手你就是还我老板。你要是再需要我，我会等你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: If that's the way you're going to play, lover.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你要想这么玩，那就如你所愿，爱人。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Following the Second Battle of Hoover Dam, Veronica left the Mojave and traveled east with the Courier, or rather "the Lone Wanderer."
ESP.TRADUIT: 在胡佛大坝的第二次战役后，维罗妮卡离开了莫哈维沙漠，与邮差或称为“独行者“一同向东旅行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\femaleuniqueveronica\tttq_vendingveronica_000384fe_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Although the journey across the country was difficult, when she finally saw Project Purity with her own eyes, she knew she had made the right decision.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管穿越国家的旅程充满艰辛，但当维罗妮卡亲眼看到净化计划时，她深知自己做出了正确的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\femaleuniqueveronica\tttq_vendingveronica_000384fe_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In the Capital Wasteland, Veronica found work that both resonated with her personal beliefs and also honored the memories of her parents.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在首都废土上，维罗妮卡找到了与她个人信念相符的工作，同时也以此缅怀她的父母。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\femaleuniqueveronica\tttq_vendingveronica_000384fe_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: For the first time in as long as she could remember, Veronica felt pride in calling herself a "Scribe of the Brotherhood of Steel."
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是她记忆中第一次，维罗妮卡为自己被称为“钢铁兄弟会的文员”而感到自豪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) NPC : Ron the Narrator [00161EB2] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\femaleuniqueveronica\tttq_vendingveronica_000384fe_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In Atom's name, you'll pay for your transgressions!
ESP.TRADUIT: 以原子的名义，你会为你的罪行付出代价的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just diffused the bomb. You're welcome!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我刚刚拆除了炸弹。不用谢！
[成功]孩子，愿你沐浴在原子光芒之中。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish you well on your path.
Atom has spoken to me! The time has come for this bomb to slumber so it might later awaken stronger!
ESP.TRADUIT: 原子之神已与我对话！是时候让这枚炸弹进入休眠了，待它日后觉醒，必将更加强大！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] In Atom's name, you'll pay for your transgressions!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 以原子之神的名义，你要为你的罪过付出代价!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Atom has spoken to me! The time has come for this bomb to slumber so it might later awaken stronger!
ESP.TRADUIT: 原子之神已与我对话！是时候让这枚炸弹进入休眠了，待它日后觉醒，必将更加强大！
[成功]孩子，愿你沐浴在原子光芒之中。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish you well on your path.
Atom has spoken to me! The time has come for this bomb to slumber so it might later awaken stronger!
ESP.TRADUIT: 原子之神已与我对话！是时候让这枚炸弹进入休眠了，待它日后觉醒，必将更加强大！

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] In Atom's name, you'll pay for your transgressions!
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 以原子之神的名义，你要为你的罪过付出代价!

ESP.ORIGINAL: Atom has spoken to me! The time has come for this bomb to slumber so it might later awaken stronger!
ESP.TRADUIT: 原子之神已与我对话！是时候让这枚炸弹进入休眠了，待它日后觉醒，必将更加强大！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish you well on your path.
Atom has spoken to me! The time has come for this bomb to slumber so it might later awaken stronger!
ESP.TRADUIT: 原子之神已与我对话！是时候让这枚炸弹进入休眠了，待它日后觉醒，必将更加强大！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish you well on your path.
Atom has spoken to me! The time has come for this bomb to slumber so it might later awaken stronger!
ESP.TRADUIT: 原子之神已与我对话！是时候让这枚炸弹进入休眠了，待它日后觉醒，必将更加强大！

ESP.ORIGINAL: In Atom's name, you'll pay for your transgressions!
ESP.TRADUIT: 以原子的名义，你会为你的罪行付出代价的！

ESP.ORIGINAL: We are justice. We are the law.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们就是正义，我们就是法律。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regulator Representative [0D01C42B] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult06dc\tttq_tttturnin_0001c42a_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have fingers to turn in.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regulator Representative [0D01C42B] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult06dc\tttq_tttturnin_0001c42d_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have fingers to turn in.
We bring law to a lawless land.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们把法律带到了无法无天的土地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regulator Representative [0D01C42B] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult06dc\tttq_tttturnin_0001c42e_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have fingers to turn in.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Regulator Representative [0D01C42B] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult06dc\tttq_tttturnin_0001c432_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any fingers right now.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Littlehorn & Associates Representative [0D01C435] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult04\tttq_tttturnin_0001c43c_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got ears to turn in.
Here you go. Put it to good use.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Littlehorn & Associates Representative [0D01C435] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult04\tttq_tttturnin_0001c43d_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got ears to turn in.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Littlehorn & Associates Representative [0D01C435] (mod) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult04\tttq_tttturnin_0001c43e_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have any ears at the moment.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Doctor Barrows [000156F0] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\malegenericghouldc\tttq_tttturnin_00029a0a_1.wav
NPC : Doctor Barrows [000156F0] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\malegenericghouldc\tttq_tttturnin_00029a0a_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've got body parts for you.
I'm with a Chapter from the East Coast. I'm here to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和东海岸的兄弟会一起来的。我来帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then allow me to explain our situation. This bunker is currently locked down, allowing no entry or exit, with you being one of the few exceptions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么请允许我解释一下我们的情况。这个掩体目前被封锁，不允许进出，你是少数例外之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult01default\tttq_tttmojavebos_00031d80_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In exceptional cases, teams are sent out to investigate sites or retrieve materials deemed too important to ignore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在特殊情况下，团队会派出人员去调查现场或取回被视为过于重要而不能忽视的材料。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult01default\tttq_tttmojavebos_00031d80_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Three such teams have gone missing recently, and the news of their disappearance has not yet been widely spread to avoid undue concern.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近有三支这样的队伍失踪了，为了避免不必要的担忧，他们失踪的消息尚未广泛传播。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult01default\tttq_tttmojavebos_00031d80_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In order to maintain the peace, and adhere to the strictures of the lockdown, I need to send someone else to discover what happened to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了维持和平，遵守封锁的严格规定，我需要派人去了解他们的遭遇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult01default\tttq_tttmojavebos_00031d80_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm afraid one of your patrols is dead, but I'm with a Brotherhood Chapter from the East Coast. I'm here to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 恐怕你们的一个巡逻兵死了，但是我和东海岸的兄弟会一起来的。我来帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then allow me to explain our situation. This bunker is currently locked down, allowing no entry or exit, with you being one of the few exceptions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那么请允许我解释一下我们的情况。这个掩体目前被封锁，不允许进出，你是少数例外之一。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult01default\tttq_tttmojavebos_00031d81_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In exceptional cases, teams are sent out to investigate sites or retrieve materials deemed too important to ignore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在特殊情况下，团队会派出人员去调查现场或取回被视为过于重要而不能忽视的材料。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult01default\tttq_tttmojavebos_00031d81_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Three such teams have gone missing recently, and the news of their disappearance has not yet been widely spread to avoid undue concern.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近有三支这样的队伍失踪了，为了避免不必要的担忧，他们失踪的消息尚未广泛传播。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult01default\tttq_tttmojavebos_00031d81_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In order to maintain the peace, and adhere to the strictures of the lockdown, I need to send someone else to discover what happened to them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 为了维持和平，遵守封锁的严格规定，我需要派人去了解他们的遭遇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elder McNamara [000E2F84] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\maleadult01default\tttq_tttmojavebos_00031d81_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm with a Brotherhood Chapter from the East Coast. I'm here to help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我是东海岸兄弟会分会的人，我来帮忙。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Go east? Maybe you're right. There's no place for me in the Mojave anymore.
ESP.TRADUIT: 往东走？也许你是对的。莫哈维已经没有我的位置了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\femaleuniqueveronica\tttq_tttveronica_000384df_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But what makes your Chapter different from the zealots at Hidden Valley?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你的分会与隐秘山谷的狂热者有何不同?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\femaleuniqueveronica\tttq_tttveronica_000384df_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: There's another option. You can go east with me and join my Brotherhood Chapter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有另一种选择。你可以和我一起去东部，加入我的兄弟会分会。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, really? I can't even imagine the Brotherhood caring if a wastelander has clean drinking water.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇,真的吗?我无法想象兄弟会会关心一个垃圾填埋场是否有干净的饮用水。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\femaleuniqueveronica\tttq_tttveronicaa_000384e1_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Once everything has settled down in the Mojave, I'd like to see this Project Purity for myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一旦莫哈维的一切安定下来，我想亲自去看看那个净水计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\femaleuniqueveronica\tttq_tttveronicaa_000384e1_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I realize I shouldn't be running from the Brotherhood of Steel. I can't forget who I am or where I come from.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我意识到我不应该逃避钢铁兄弟会。我不能忘记我是谁，我从哪里来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\femaleuniqueveronica\tttq_tttveronicaa_000384e1_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I shouldn't have to sacrifice my ideals either. I refuse to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我也不应该牺牲我的理想。我拒绝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\femaleuniqueveronica\tttq_tttveronicaa_000384e1_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if what you say about your Chapter is true, then maybe I won't need to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你所说的关于你的分会的事情是真的，那么我可能就不需要了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\femaleuniqueveronica\tttq_tttveronicaa_000384e1_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here's hoping they accept my application. You'll write me a good reference letter, right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但愿他们能接受我的申请。你会给我写一封推荐信吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\femaleuniqueveronica\tttq_tttveronicaa_000384e1_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: We actually use technology to improve the wasteland. Project Purity, for example, has made purified water accessible to all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们实际上用科技来改善废土。比如“纯净计划”让所有人都能获得纯净水。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's what I was afraid you might say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我就是怕你这么说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Veronica [000E32AA] (file) Quest : ([0D0028EA]TTTQ) 0D0028EA (EDID) EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\tweaksttw.esm\femaleuniqueveronica\tttq_tttveronicab_000384fc_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Actually forget I said anything. The Brotherhood is the same everywhere.
ESP.TRADUIT: 忘记我说过的话吧。哪里的兄弟会都是一样的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Normally, it would be out of the question to train a local to wear power armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通常情况下，训练当地人穿上动力盔甲是不可能的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: But, since you've proven your usefulness to the Outcast, I'll make an exception.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但既然你向流放者证明了自己的价值，我就破例一次。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok. Let's get started. Are you ready?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的。我们开始吧。你准备好了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you train me to wear power armor?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能训练我穿动力装甲吗?

ESP.ORIGINAL: See? Not too hard. You just have to know how to move with the armor. Wear it like a second skin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看到了吗？没那么难。你只需要知道如何随着装甲移动。把它当作你的第二层皮肤来穿。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Now if you want your own suit of power armor, you'll need to find one yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 现在如果你想要一套你自己的动力装甲，你得自己去找。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't be giving you one from our armory, but you're a resourceful person. You'll find a suit for yourself in no time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会从我们的军械库给你一套，但你是个足智多谋的人。你很快就会找到一套适合自己的装备的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do have a bounty for you. See to it that they know the justice of the Regulators.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我确实有一个赏金要给你。让他们知道治安官的正义。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have a bounty target for me?
The unrighteous have been punished. Well done.
COMPANION ONLY - Veronica gains +2 DT and her unarmed attack rate goes up by 15%.
ESP.TRADUIT: 仅限同伴使用——维罗妮卡获得+2点伤害减免，并且她的徒手攻击速度提升15%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Veronica has received the Reforged Steel perk, which boosts her unarmed attack rate and increases her armor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维罗妮卡获得了“重铸钢铁”技能，这个技能不仅提升了她的徒手攻击速度，还增加了她的防御力。
杰斐逊博物馆与礼品店
安纳代尔鹰爪公司营地
